roleset.name: provide a payout
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. Same as pay.03 (pay_out)

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: The banks etc now have to reply within 8 weeks of sending the form , sadly , there 's no deadline [in which]-1 they have to payout once they 've accepted liability and you 've accepted their offer *-1 .
example.arg: once they've accepted liability and you've accepted their offer

example.name: with arg1
example.text: How long does the insurance have *PRO* to payout my claim after we have agreed on a price?
example.arg: after we have agreed on a price
